text: Christian Malheiros (born 5 May 2000) is a Brazilian actor. He started his career in theater at nine years old and made his film debut in 2018, in the drama film Sócrates, for which he was nominated for Best Male Lead at the Independent Spirit Awards. == Filmography == === Film === {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Title !Role !Director |- |2018 |Sócrates |Sócrates |Alexandre Moratto |} === Television === {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Role !Notes |- |2019 |Sintonia |Nando |Main character |} == Awards and nominations == {| class="wikitable" |+ !Year !Award !Category !Work !Result !Ref |- |2019 |Film Independent Spirit Awards |Best Male Lead | rowspan="3" |Sócrates | | |- |2018 |International Filmfestival Mannheim-Heidelberg |Best Actor | | |- |2018 |Festival MixBrasil de Cultura da Diversidade |Best Actor | | |} == References == Category:Brazilian film actors Category:2000 births Category:Living people
title: Christian Malheiros
